Name: hin-suhelfarooqkhan-la
Author: Suhel Farooq Khan And Saifur Rahman Nadwi

Translations.Text: aur hamane usake marane ke baad usakee qaum par unakee tabaahee ke lie na to aasamaan se koee lashakar utaara aur na ham kabhee itanee see baat ke vaaste lashakar utaarane vaale the
vah to sirph ek chinghaad thee (jo kar dee gayee bas) phir to vah phauran chiraage saharee kee tarah bujh ke rah gae
hae aphasos bandon ke haal par ki kabhee unake paas koee rasool nahin aaya magar un logon ne usake saath masakharaapan zaroor kiya
kya un logon ne itana bhee gaur nahin kiya ki hamane unase pahale kitanee ummaton ko halaak kar daala aur vah log unake paas haragiz palat kar nahin aa sakate
(haan) alabatta sab ke sab ikattha ho kar hamaaree baaragaah mein haazir kie jaenge
aur unake (samajhane) ke lie meree kudarat kee ek nishaanee murda (paratee) zameen hai ki hamane usako (paanee se) zinda kar diya aur ham hee ne usase daana nikaala to use ye log khaaya karate hain
aur ham hee ne zameen mein chhuhaaron aur angooron ke baag lagae aur hamahee ne usamen paanee ke chashamen jaaree kie
taaki log unake phal khaen aur kuchh unake haathon ne use nahin banaaya (balki khuda ne) to kya ye log (is par bhee) shukr nahin karate
vah (har aib se) paak saaph hai jisane zameen se ugane vaalee cheezon aur khud un logon ke aur un cheezon ke jinakee unhen khabar nahin sabake jode paida kie
aur meree qudarat kee ek nishaanee raat hai jisase ham din ko kheench kar nikaal lete (jael kar dete) hain to us vakt ye log andhere mein rah jaate hain
aur (ek nishaanee) aaphataab hai jo apane ek thikaane par chal raha hai ye (sabase) gaalib vaaqiph (khuda) ka (baandda hua) andaaza hai
aur hamane chaand ke lie manzilen muqarrar kar deen hain yahaan tak ki hir phir ke (aakhir maah mein) khajoor kee puraanee tahanee ka sa (patala tedha) ho jaata hai

na to aaphataab hee se ye ban padata hai ki vah maahataab ko ja le aur na raat hee din se aage badh sakatee hai (chaand, sooraj, sitaare) har ek apane-apane aasamaan (madaar) mein chakkar laga rahen hain
aur unake lie (meree kudarat) kee ek nishaanee ye hai ki unake burzugon ko (nooh kee) bharee huee kashtee mein savaar kiya
aur us kashatee ke misal un logon ke vaaste bhee vah cheeze (kashatiyaan) jahaaz paida kar dee
jin par ye log savaar hua karate hain aur agar ham chaahen to un sab logon ko duba maaren phir na koee un ka phariyaad ras hoga aur na vah log chhutakaara hee pa sakate hain
magar hamaaree meharabaanee se aur choonki ek (khaas) vakt tak (unako) chain karane dena (manzoor) hai
aur jab un kuphfaar se kaha jaata hai ki is (azaab se) bacho (har vakt tumhaare saath-saath) tumhaare saamane aur tumhaare peechhe (maujood) hai taaki tum par raham kiya jae
(to paravaah nahin karate) aur unakee haalat ye hai ki jab unake paravaradigaar kee nishaaniyon mein se koee nishaanee unake paas aayee to ye log munh mode bagair kabhee nahin rahe

aur jab un (kuphfaar) se kaha jaata hai ki (maale duniya se) jo khuda ne tumhen diya hai usamen se kuchh (khuda kee raah mein bhee) kharch karo to (ye) kuphfaar eemaanavaalon se kahate hain ki bhala ham us shakhs ko khilaen jise (tumhaare khyaal ke muvaafiq) khuda chaahata to usako khud khilaata ki tum log bas sareehee gumaraahee mein (pade hue) ho
aur kahate hain ki (bhala) agar tum log (apane daave mein sachche ho) to aakhir ye (qayaamat ka) vaayada kab poora hoga
(ai rasool) ye log ek sakht chinghaad (soor) ke munatazir hain jo unhen (us vakt) le daalegee
jab ye log baaham jhagad rahe hogen phir na to ye log vaseeyat hee karane paayenge aur na apane ladake baalon hee kee taraph laut kar ja sakegen
aur phir (jab dobaara) soor phoonka jaega to usee dam ye sab log (apanee-apanee) qabron se (nikal-nikal ke) apane paravaradigaar kee baaragaah kee taraph chal khade hoge
aur (hairaan hokar) kahegen hae aphasos ham to pahale so rahe the hamen khvaabagaah se kisane uthaaya (javaab aaega) ki ye vahee (qayaamat ka) din hai jisaka khuda ne (bhee) vaayada kiya tha
aur paigambaron ne bhee sach kaha tha (qayaamat to) bas ek sakht chinghaad hogee phir eka ekee ye log sab ke sab hamaare hujoor mein haazir kie jaenge
phir aaj (qayaamat ke din) kisee shakhs par kuchh bhee zulm na hoga aur tum logon ko to usee ka badala diya jaega jo tum log (duniya mein) kiya karate the
behasht ke rahane vaale aaj (roje qayaamat) ek na ek mashagale mein jee bahala rahe hain
vah apanee beeviyon ke saath (thandee) chhaanv mein takiya lagae takhton par (chain se) baithe hue hain
beihasht mein unake lie (taaza) meve (taiyaar) hain aur jo vah chaahen unake lie (haazir) hai
meharabaan paravaradigaar kee taraph se salaam ka paigaam aaega
aur (ek aavaaz aaegee ki) ai gunaahagaaron tum log (inase) alag ho jao
ai aadam kee aulaad kya mainne tumhaare paas ye hukm nahin bheja tha ki (khabaradaar) shaitaan kee parasatish na karana vah yaqeenee tumhaara khullam khulla dushman hai
aur ye ki (dekho) sirph meree ibaadat karana yahee (najaat kee) seedhee raah hai
aur (baavajood isake) usane tumamen se bahuteron ko gumaraah kar chhoda to kya tum (itana bhee) nahin samajhate the
ye vahee jahannum hai jisaka tumase vaayada kiya gaya tha
to ab choonki tum kuphr karate the is vajah se aaj isamen (chupake se) chale jao
aaj ham unake munh par muhar laga degen aur (jo) kaarasataaniyaan ye log duniya mein kar rahe the khud unake haath hamako bata degen aur unake paanv gavaahee degen
aur agar ham chaahen to unakee onkhon par jhaadoo pher den to ye log raah ko pade chakkar lagaate dhoondhate phiren magar kahaan dekh paanege
aur agar ham chaahe to jahaan ye hain (vaheen) unakee sooraten badal (karake) (patthar mittee bana) den phir na to unamen aage jaane ka qaaboo rahe aur na (ghar) laut saken
aur ham jis shakhs ko (bahut) jyaada umr dete hain to use khilaqat mein ulat (kar bachchon kee tarah majaboor kar) dete hain to kya vah log samajhate nahin
aur hamane na us (paigambar) ko sher kee taaleem dee hai aur na shaayaree usakee shaan ke laayaq hai ye (kitaab) to bas (niree) naseehat aur saaph-saaph kuraan hai
taaki jo zinda (dil aaqil) hon use (azaab se) darae aur kaafiron par (azaab ka) qaul saabit ho jae (aur hujjat baaqee na rahe)
kya un logon ne is par bhee gaur nahin kiya ki hamane unake phaayade ke lie chaarapae us cheez se paida kie jise hamaaree hee qudarat ne banaaya to ye log (khvaahamaakhvaah) unake maalik ban gae
aur ham hee ne chaar paayon ko unaka muteey bana diya to baaz unakee savaariyaan hain aur baaz ko khaate hain
aur chaar paayon mein unake (aur) bahut se phaayade hain aur peene kee cheez (doodh) to kya ye log (is par bhee) shukr nahin karate
aur logon ne khuda ko chhodakar (pharzee maabood banae hain taaki unhen unase kuchh madd mile haalaanki vah log unakee kisee tarah madd kar hee nahin sakate)
aur ye kuphfaar un maaboodon ke lashakar hain (aur qayaamat mein) un sabakee haaziree lee jaegee
to (ai rasool) tum inakee baaton se aazurada khaatir (perashaan) na ho jo kuchh ye log chhipa kar karate hain aur jo kuchh khullam khulla karate hain-ham sabako yaqeenee jaanate hain
kya aadamee ne is par bhee gaur nahin kiya ki ham hee ne isako ek zaleel nutphe se paida kiya phir vah yakaayak (hamaara hee) khullam khulla muqaabil (bana) hai

aur hamaaree nisabat baaten banaane laga aur apanee khilaqat (kee haalat) bhool gaya aur kahane laga ki bhala jab ye haddiyaan (sadagal kar) khaak ho jaengee to (phir) kaun (dobaara) zinda kar sakata hai
(ai rasool) tum kah do ki usako vahee zinda karega jisane unako (jab ye kuchh na the) pahalee baar zinda kar (rakha)
aur vah har tarah kee paidaish se vaaqiph hai jisane tumhaare vaaste (mirkh aur afaar ke) hare darakht se aag paida kar dee phir tum usase (aur) aag sulaga lete ho

(bhala) jis (khuda) ne saare aasamaan aur zameen paida kie kya vah is par qaaboo nahin rakhata ki unake misl (dobaara) paida kar de haan (zaroor qaaboo rakhata hai) aur vah to paida karane vaala vaaqifakaar hai
usakee shaan to ye hai ki jab kisee cheez ko (paida karana) chaahata hai to vah kah deta hai ki ho ja to (phauran) ho jaatee hai
to vah khud (har naphs se) paak saaf hai jisake qabze kudarat mein har cheez kee hikamat hai aur tum log usee kee taraph laut kar jaoge
(ibaadat ya jihaad mein) par baandhane vaalon kee (qasam)
phir (badon ko buraee se) jhidak kar daantane vaale kee (qasam)
phir kuraan padhane vaalon kee qasam hai
tumhaara maabood (yaqeenee) ek hee hai
jo saare aasamaan zameen ka aur jo kuchh in donon ke daramiyaan hai (sabaka) paravaradigaar hai
aur (chaand sooraj taare ke) tuloou va (guroob) ke maqaamaat ka bhee maalik hai ham hee ne neeche vaale aasamaan ko taaron kee aarish (jagamagaahat) se aaraasta kiya
aur (taaron ko) har sarakash shaitaan se hifaazat ke vaaste (bhee paida kiya)
ki ab shaitaan aalame baala kee taraf kaan bhee nahin laga sakate aur (jahaan sun gun lena chaaha to) har taraf se khadedane ke lie shahaab pheke jaate hain
aur unake lie paedaar azaab hai
magar jo (shaitaan shaaz va naadir pharishton kee) koee baat uchak le bhaagata hai to aag ka dahakata hua teer usaka peechha karata hai
to (ai rasool) tum unase poochho to ki unaka paida karana jyaada dushvaar hai ya un (mazakoora) cheezon ka jinako hamane paida kiya hamane to un logon ko lasadaar mittee se paida kiya
balki tum (un kuphfaar ke inkaar par) taajjub karate ho aur vah log (tumase) masakharaapan karate hain
aur jab unhen samajhaaya jaata hai to samajhate nahin hain
aur jab kisee maujije qo dekhate hain to (usase) masakharaapan karate hain
aur kahate hain ki ye to bas khula hua jaadoo hai
bhala jab ham mar jaenge aur khaak aur haddiyaan rah jaenge
to kya ham ya hamaare agale baap daada phir dobaara qabron se utha khade kie jaanege
(ai rasool) tum kah do ki haan (zaroor uthae jaoge)
aur tum zaleel hoge aur vah (qayaamat) to ek lalakaar hogee phir to vah log fauran hee (onkhe phaad-phaad ke) dekhane lagenge
aur kahenge hae aphasos ye to qayaamat ka din hai
(javaab aaega) ye vahee phaisale ka din hai jisako tum log (duniya mein) jhooth samajhate the
(aur farishton ko hukm hoga ki) jo log (duniya mein) sarakashee karate the unako aur unake saathiyon ko aur khuda ko chhodakar jinakee parasatish karate hain
unako (sabako) ikattha karo phir unhen jahannum kee raah dikhao
aur (haan zara) unhen thaharao to unase kuchh poochhana hai
(are kamabakhton) ab tumhen kya hoga ki ek doosare kee madad nahin karate
(javaab kya denge) balki vah to aaj gardan jhukae hue hain
aur ek doosare kee taraph mutaavajje hokar baaham poochhataachh karenge
(aur insaan shayaateen se) kahenge ki tum hee to hamaaree daahinee taraph se (hamen bahakaane ko) chadh aate the
vah javaab degen (ham kya jaanen) tum to khud eemaan laane vaale na the
aur (saaf to ye hai ki) hamaaree tum par kuchh hukoomat to thee nahin balki tum khud sarakash log the
phir ab to logon par hamaare paravaradigaar ka (azaab ka) qaul poora ho gaya ki ab ham sab yaqeenan azaab ka maza chakhenge
ham khud gumaraah the to tum ko bhee gumaraah kiya
garaz ye log sab ke sab us din azaab mein shareek hogen
aur ham to gunaahagaaron ke saath yoon hee kiya karate hain ye log aise (shareer) the
ki jab unase kaha jaata tha ki khuda ke siva koee maabood nahin to akada karate the
aur ye log kahate the ki kya ek paagal shaayar ke lie ham apane maaboodon ko chhod baithen (are kambakhton ye shaayar ya paagal nahin)
balki ye to haq baat lekar aaya hai aur (agale) paigambaron kee tasadeeq karata hai
tum log (agar na maanoge) to zaroor dardanaak azaab ka maza chakhoge
aur tumhen to usake kiye ka badala diya jaega jo (jo duniya mein) karate rahe
magar khuda ke baragujeeda bande
unake vaaste (behisht mein) ek muqarrar rozee hogee
(aur vah bhee aisee vaisee nahin) har qism ke meve
aur vah log badee ijzat se neamat ke (lade hue)
baagon mein takhton par (chain se) aamane saamane baithe hoge
unamen saaph saphed burraaq sharaab ke jaam ka daur chal raha hoga
jo peene vaalon ko bada maza degee
(aur phir) na us sharaab mein khumaar kee vajah se) dard sar hoga aur na vah us (ke peene) se matavaale honge
aur unake pahaloo mein (sharm se) neechee nigaahen karane vaalee badee badee onkhon vaalee pariyaan hogee
(unakee) goree-goree rangaton mein halkee see surkhee aisee jhalakatee hogee
goya vah ande hain jo chhipae hue rakhe ho
phir ek doosare kee taraph mutaavajje paakar baaham baatacheet karate karate unamen se ek kahane vaala bol uthega ki (duniya mein) mera ek dost tha
aur (mujhase) kaha karata tha ki kya tum bhee qayaamat kee tasadeeq karane vaalon mein ho
(bhala jab ham mar jaenge) aur (sad gal kar) mittee aur havee (hokar) rah jaenge to kya hamako dobaara zinda karake hamaare (aamaal ka) badala diya jaega
phir apane behasht ke saathiyon se kahega
to kya tum log bhee (mere saath use jhaank kar dekhoge) garaz jhaanka to use beech jahannum mein (pada hua) dekha
(ye dekh kar besaakhta) bol uthega ki khuda kee qasam tum to mujhe bhee tabaah karane hee ko the
aur agar mere paravaradigaar ka ehasaan na hota to main bhee (is vakt) teree tarah jahannum mein giraphtaar kiya gaya hota
(ab batao) kya (main tum se na kahata tha) ki ham ko is pahalee maut ke siva phir marana nahin hai
aur na ham par (aakherat) mein azaab hoga
(to tumhen yaqeen na hota tha) ye yaqeenee bahut badee kaamayaabee hai
aisee (hee kaamayaabee) ke vaaste kaam karane vaalon ko kaaraguzaaree karanee chaahie
bhala mehamaanee ke vaaste ye (saamaan) behatar hai ya thohad ka darakht (jo jahannumiyon ke vaaste hoga)
jise hamane yaqeenan zaalimon kee aazamaish ke lie banaaya hai
ye vah darakht hain jo jahannum kee tah mein ugata hai
usake phal aise (badanuma) hain goya (hoo bahoo) saanp ke phan jise chhoote dil dare
phir ye (jahannumee log) yaqeenan usamen se khaenge phir usee se apane pet bharenge
phir usake oopar se un ko khoob khaulata hua paanee (peep vagairah mein) mila milaakar peene ko diya jaega
phir (kha peekar) unako jahannum kee taraph yaqeenan laut jaana hoga
un logon ne apan baap daada ko gumaraah paaya tha
ye log bhee unake peechhe daude chale ja rahe hain
aur unake qabl agalon mein se bahutere gumaraah ho chuke
un logon ke daraane vaale (paigambaron) ko bheja tha
zara dekho to ki jo log darae ja chuke the unaka kya bura anjaam hua
magar (haan) khuda ke nire khare bande (mahaphooz rahe)
aur nooh ne (apanee kaum se maayoos hokar) hamen zaroor pukaara tha (dekho ham) kya khoob javaab dene vaale the
aur hamane unako aur unake ladake vaalon ko badee (sakht) museebat se najaat dee
aur hamane (unamen vah barakat dee ki) unakee aulaad ko (duniya mein) baraqaraar rakha
aur baad ko aane vaale logon mein unaka achchha charcha baaqee rakha
ki saaree khudaayee mein (har taraph se) nooh par salaam hai
ham nekee karane vaalon ko yoon jazae khair ata pharamaate hain
isamen shak nahin ki nooh hamaare (khaas) eemaanadaar bandon se the
phir hamane baaqee logon ko dubo diya
aur yaqeenan unheen ke tareeqo par chalane vaalon mein ibaraaheem (bhee) zaroor the
jab vah apane paravaradigaar (ki ibaadat) kee taraph (pahaloo mein) aisa dil lie hue badhe jo (har aib se paak tha)
jab unhonne apane (munh bole) baap aur apanee qaum se kaha ki tum log kis cheez kee parasatish karate ho
kya khuda ko chhodakar dil se gadhe hue maaboodon kee tamanna rakhate ho
phir saaree khudaee ke paalane vaale ke saath tumhaara kya khyaal hai
phir (ek eed mein un logon ne chalane ko kaha) to ibaraaheem ne sitaaron kee taraf ek nazar dekha
aur kaha ki main (anaqareeb) beemaar padane vaala hoon
to vah log ibaraaheem ke paas se peeth pher pher kar hat gae
(bas) phir to ibaraaheem chupake se unake buton kee taraph mutaavajje hue aur (taan se) kaha tumhaare saamane itane chadhaav rakhate hain
aakhir tum khaate kyon nahin (are tumhen kya ho gaya hai)
ki tum bolate tak nahin
phir to ibaraaheem daahine haath se maarate hue un par pil pade (aur tod-phod kar ek bade but ke gale mein kulhaadee daal dee)
jab un logon ko khabar huee to ibaraaheem ke paas daudate hue pahunche
ibaraaheem ne kaha (afasos) tum log usakee parasatish karate ho jise tum log khud taraash kar banaate ho
haalaanki tumako aur jisako tum log banaate ho (sabako) khuda hee ne paida kiya hai (ye sunakar) vah log (aapas mein kahane lage) isake lie (bhattee kee see) ek imaarat banao
aur (usamen aag sulaga kar usee dahakatee huee aag mein isako daal do) phir un logon ne ibaraaheem ke saath makkaaree karanee chaahee
to hamane (aag sard gulazaar karake) unhen neecha dikhaaya aur jab (aazar ne) ibaraaheem ko nikaal diya to bole main apane paravaradigaar kee taraph jaata hoon
vah anaqareeb hee mujhe roobara kar dega (phir garaj kee) paravaradigaar mujhe ek neko kaar (pharazand) inaayat pharama
to hamane unako ek bade naram dile ladake (ke paida hone kee) khushakhabaree dee

phir jab ismaeel apane baap ke saath daud dhoop karane laga to (ek dapha) ibaraaheem ne kaha beta khoob main (vahee ke zariye kya) dekhata hoon ki main to khud tumhen zibaah kar raha hoon to tum bhee gaur karo tumhaaree isamen kya raay hai isamaeel ne kaha abba jaan jo aapako hukm hua hai usako (be taammul) keejie agar khuda ne chaaha to mujhe aap sabr karane vaalon mein se paege
phir jab donon ne ye thaan lee aur baap ne bete ko (zibaah karane ke lie) maathe ke bal litaaya
aur hamane (aamaada dekhakar) aavaaz dee ai ibaraaheem
tumane apane khvaab ko sach kar dikhaaya ab tum donon ko bade maratabe milegen ham nekee karane vaalon ko yoon jazae khair dete hain
isamen shak nahin ki ye yaqeenee bada sakht aur sareehee imtihaan tha
aur hamane ismaeel ka fidaya ek zibaahe azeem (badee kurbaanee) qaraar diya
aur hamane unaka achchha charcha baad ko aane vaalon mein baaqee rakha hai
ki (saaree khudaayee mein) ibaraaheem par salaam (hee salaam) hain
ham yoon nekee karane vaalon ko jazae khair dete hain
beshak ibaraaheem hamaare (khaas) eemaanadaar bandon mein the
aur hamane ibaraaheem ko isahaaq (ke paida hone kee) khushakhabaree dee thee

jo ek nekosaar nabee the aur hamane khud ibaraaheem par aur isahaaq par apanee barakat naazil kee aur in donon kee nasl mein baaz to nekokaar aur baaz (naapharamaanee karake) apanee jaan par sareehee sitam dhaane vaala
aur hamane moosa aur haaroon par bahut se ehasaanaat kie hain
aur khud donon ko aur inakee qaum ko badee (sakht) museebat se najaat dee
aur (phiraun ke muqaabale mein) hamane unakee madad kee to (aakhir) yahee log gaalib rahe
aur hamane un donon ko ek vaazee ulam taalib kitaab (tauret) ata kee
aur donon ko seedhee raah kee hidaayat faramaee
aur baad ko aane vaalon mein unaka zikre khair baaqee rakha
ki (har jagah) moosa aur haaroon par salaam (hee salaam) hai
ham nekee karane vaalon ko yoon jazae khair ata pharamaate hain
beshak ye donon hamaare (khaalis eemaanadaar bandon mein se the)
aur isamen shak nahin ki iliyaas yaqeenan paigambaron mein se the
jab unhonne apanee qaum se kaha ki tum log (khuda se) kyon nahin darate
kya tum log baal (but) kee parasatish karate ho aur khuda ko chhode baithe ho jo sabase behatar paida karane vaala hai
aur (jo) tumhaara paravaradigaar aur tumhaare agale baap daadaon ka (bhee) paravaradigaar hai
to use logon ne jhuthala diya to ye log yaqeenan (jahannum) mein giraphtaar kie jaenge
magar khuda ke nire khare bande mahaphooz rahenge
aur hamane unaka zikr khair baad ko aane vaalon mein baaqee rakha
ki (har taraph se) aale yaaseen par salaam (hee salaam) hai
ham yaqeenan nekee karane vaalon ko aisa hee badala diya karate hain
beshak vah hamaare (khaalis) eemaanadaar bandon mein the
aur isamen bhee shak nahin ki loot yaqeenee paigambaron mein se the
jab hamane unako aur unake ladake vaalon sab ko najaat dee
magar ek (unakee) boodhee beebee jo peechhe rah jaane vaalon hee mein theen
phir hamane baaqee logon ko tabaah va barbaad kar diya
aur ai ahale makka tum log bhee un par se (kabhee) subah ko aur (kabhee) shaam ko (aate jaate guzarate ho)
to kya tum (itana bhee) nahin samajhate
aur isamen shak nahin ki yoonus (bhee) paigambaron mein se the
(vah vakt yaad karo) jab yoonus bhaag kar ek bharee huee kashtee ke paas pahunche
to (ahale kashtee ne) kura daala to (unaka hee naam nikala) yoonus ne zak uthaayee (aur dariya mein gir pade)
to unako ek machhalee nigal gayee aur yoonus khud (apanee) malaamat kar rahe the
phir agar yoonus (khuda kee) tasabeeh (va zikr) na karate
to roze qayaamat tak machhalee ke pet mein rahate
phir hamane unako (machhalee ke pet se nikaal kar) ek khule maidaan mein daal diya
aur (vah thodee der mein) beemaar nidhaal ho gae the aur hamane un par saaye ke lie ek kaddoo ka darakht uga diya
aur (isake baad) hamane ek laakh balki (ek hisaab se) jyaada aadamiyon kee taraph (paigambar bana kar bheja)
to vah log (un par) eemaan lae phir hamane (bhee) ek khaas vakt tak unako chain se rakha
to (ai rasool) un kuphfaar se poochho ki kya tumhaare paravaradigaar ke lie betiyaan hain aur unake lie bete
(kya vaaqee) hamane pharishton kee auraten banaaya hai aur ye log (us vakt) maujood the
khabaradaar (yaad rakho ki) ye log yaqeenan apane dil se gadh-gadh ke kahate hain ki khuda aulaad vaala hai
aur ye log yaqeenee jhoothe hain
kya khuda ne (apane lie) betiyon ko beton par tarajeeh dee hai
(are kambakhton) tumhen kya junoon ho gaya hai tum log (baithe-baithe) kaisa phaisala karate ho
to kya tum (itana bhee) gaur nahin karate
ya tumhaare paas (isakee) koee vaazee va raushan daleel hai
to agar tum (apane daave mein) sachche ho to apanee kitaab pesh karo
aur un logon ne khuda aur jinnaat ke daramiyaan rishta naata muqarrar kiya hai haalaanki jinnaat bakhoobee jaanate hain ki vah log yaqeenee (qayaamat mein bandon kee tarah) haazir kie jaenge
ye log jo baaten banaaya karate hain inase khuda paak saaf hai
magar khuda ke nire khare bande (aisa nahin kahate)
garaz tum log khud aur tumhaare maabood
usake khilaaph (kisee ko) bahaka nahin sakate
magar usako jo jahannum mein jhonka jaane vaala hai
aur pharishte ya aaimma to ye kahate hain ki main har ek ka ek daraja muqarrar hai
aur ham to yaqeenan (usakee ibaadat ke lie) saph baandhe khade rahate hain
aur ham to yaqeenee (usakee) tasbeeh padha karate hain
agarache ye kuphphaar (islaam ke qabl) kaha karate the
ki agar hamaare paas bhee agale logon ka tazakira (kisee kitaabe khuda mein) hota
to ham bhee khuda ke nire khare bande zaroor ho jaate
(magar jab kitaab aayee) to un logon ne usase inkaar kiya khair anaqareeb (usaka nateeja) unhen maaloom ho jaega
aur apane khaas bandon paigambaron se hamaaree baat pakkee ho chukee hai
ki in logon kee (hamaaree baaragaah se) yaqeenee madad kee jaegee
aur hamaara lashkar to yaqeenan gaalib rahega
to (ai rasool) tum unase ek khaas vakt tak munh phere raho
aur inako dekhate raho to ye log anaqareeb hee (apana nateeja) dekh lege
to kya ye log hamaare azaab kee jaldee kar rahe hain
phir jab (azaab) unakee anganaee mein utar padega to jo log darae ja chuke hain unakee bhee kya buree subah hogee
aur un logon se ek khaas vakt tak munh phere raho
aur dekhate raho ye log to khud anaqareeb hee apana anjaam dekh legen
ye log jo baaten (khuda ke baare mein) banaaya karate hain unase tumhaara paravaradigaar ijzat ka maalik paak saaph hai
aur paigambaron par (durood) salaam ho
aur kul taareeph khuda hee ke lie sazaavaar hain jo saare jahaann ka paalane vaala hai
saaad naseehat karane vaale kuraan kee qasam (tum barahaq nabee ho)
magar ye kuphfaar (khvaahamakhvaah) takabbur aur adaavat mein (pade andhe ho rahen hain)
hamane un se pahale kitane giroh halaak kar daale to (azaab ke vakt) ye log cheekh uthe magar chhutakaare ka vakt hee na raha tha

aur un logon ne is baat se taajjub kiya ki unheen mein ka (azaabe khuda se) ek daraanevaala (paigambar) unake paas aaya aur kaaphir log kahane lage ki ye to bada (khilaadee) jaadoogar aur pakka jhootha hai
bhala (dekho to) usane tamaam maaboodon ko (matiyaamet karake bas) ek hee maabood qaayam rakha ye to yaqeenee badee taajjub khez baat hai
aur unamen se chand ravaadaar log (majalis va aza se) ye (kah kar) chal khade hue ki (yahaan se) chal do aur apane maaboodon kee ibaadat par jame raho yaqeenan isamen (usakee) kuchh zaatee garaz hai
ham logon ne to ye baat pichhale deen mein kabhee sunee bhee nahin ho na ho ye usakee man gadhant hai

kya ham sab logon mein bas (mohammad hee qaabil tha ki) us par kuraan naazil hua, nahin baat ye hai ki inake (sire se) mere kalaam hee mein shak hai ki mera hai ya nahin balki asal ye hai ki in logon ne abhee tak azaab ke maze nahin chakhe
(is vajah se ye sharaarat hai) (ai rasool) tumhaare zabaradast fayyaaz paravaradigaar ke rahamat ke khazaane inake paas hain
ya saare aasamaan va zameen aur un donon ke daramiyaan kee salatanat inheen kee khaas hai tab inako chaahie ki raaste ya seedhiyaan lagaakar (aasamaan par) chadh jaen aur intezaam karen
(ai rasool un paigambaron ke saath jhagadane vaale) girohon mein se yahaan tumhaare muqaabale mein bhee ek lashakar hai jo shikast khaega
unase pahale nooh kee qaum aur aad aur phiraun menkhon vaala
aur samood aur loot kee qaum aur jangal ke rahane vaale (qaum shuaib ye sab paigambaron ko) jhuthala chukee hain yahee vah giroh hai
(jo shikast kha chuke) sab hee ne to paigambaron ko jhuthalaaya to hamaara azaab theek aa naazil hua
aur ye (kaaphir) log bas ek chinghaad (soor ke muntazir hain jo phir unhen) chashmen zadan kee mohalat na degee
aur ye log (mazaak se) kahate hain ki paravaradigaar hisaab ke din (qayaamat ke) qabl hee (jo) hamaaree qismat ko likha (ho) hamen jaldee de de
(ai rasool) jaisee jaisee baaten ye log karate hain un par sabr karo aur hamaare bande daood ko yaad karo jo bade koovat vaale the
beshak vah hamaaree baaragaah mein bade roojoo karane vaale the hamane pahaadon ko bhee taabedaar bana diya tha ki unake saath subah aur shaam (khuda kee) tasbeeh karate the
aur parinde bhee (yaade khuda ke vakt simat) aate aur unake pharamaabaradaar the
aur hamane unakee saltanat ko mazaboot kar diya aur hamane unako hikamat aur bahas ke phaisale kee koovat ata pharamaayee thee
(ai rasool) kya tum tak un daavedaaron kee bhee khabar pahunchee hai ki jab vah hujare (ibaadat) kee deevaar phaand pade

(aur) jab daood ke paas aa khade hue to vah unase dar gae un logon ne kaha ki aap daren nahin (ham donon) ek muqaddamen ke fareekain hain ki ham mein se ek ne doosare par jyaadatee kee hai to aap hamaare daramiyaan theek-theek phaisala kar deejie aur insaaph se ne guzariye aur hamen seedhee raah dikha deejie

(muraad ye hain ki) ye (shakhs) mera bhaee hai aur usake paas ninaannave dumbiyaan hain aur mere paas sirph ek dumbee hai us par bhee ye mujhase kahata hai ki ye dumbee bhee mujhee ko de den aur baatacheet mein mujh par sakhtee karata hai

daood ne (bagair isake ki muda aalaih se kuchh poochhen) kah diya ki ye jo teree dumbee maang kar apanee dumbiyon mein milaana chaahata hai to ye tujh par zulm karata hai aur aksar shuraka (kee) yakeenan (ye haalat hai ki) ek doosare par julm kiya karate hain magar jin logon ne (sachche dil se) eemaan kubool kiya aur achchhe (achchhe) kaam kie (vah aisa nahin karate) aur aise log bahut hee kam hain (ye sunakar donon chal die) aur ab daood ne samajha ki hamane unaka imitehaan liya (aur vah na kaamayaab rahe) phir to apane paravaradigaar se bakhshish kee dua maangane lage aur sajade mein gir pade aur (meree) taraph roojoo kee (24) (sajada)
to hamane unakee vah galatee maaph kar dee aur isamen shak nahin ki hamaaree baaragaah mein unaka taqarrub aur anjaam achchha hua

(hamane pharamaaya) ai daood hamane tumako zameen mein (apana) naeb qaraar diya to tum logon ke daramiyaan bilkul theek phaisala kiya karo aur nafasiyaanee khvaahish kee pairavee na karo basa ye peeron tumhen khuda kee raah se bahaka degee isamen shak nahin ki jo log khuda kee raah mein bhatakate hain unakee badee sakht saza hogee kyonki un logon ne hisaab ke din (qayaamat) ko bhula diya
aur hamane aasamaan aur zameen aur jo cheezen un donon ke daramiyaan hain bekaar nahin paida kiya ye un logon ka khyaal hai jo kaafir ho baithe to jo log dozakh ke munakir hain un par afasos hai

kya jin logon ne eemaan kubool kiya aur achchhe-achchhe kaam kie unako ham (un logon ke baraabar) kar den jo rooe zameen mein phasaad phailaaya karate hain ya ham parahezagaaron ko misal badakaaron ke bana den
(ai rasool) kitaab (kuraan) jo hamane tumhaare paas naazil kee hai (badee) barakat vaalee hai taaki log isakee aayaton mein gaur karen aur taaki akl vaale naseehat haasil karen
aur hamane daood ko sulemaan (sa beta) ata kiya (sulemaan bhee) kya achchhe bande the
beshak vah hamaaree taraph roojoo karane vaale the ittophaaqan ek dafa teesare pahar ko khaase ke aseel ghode unake saamane pesh kie gae

to dekhane mein ulajhe ke navaaphil mein der ho gayee jab yaad aaya to bole ki mainne apane paravaradigaar kee yaad par maal kee ulafat ko tarajeeh dee yahaan tak ki aafataab (magarib ke) parde mein chhup gaya
(to bole achchha) in ghodon ko mere paas vaapas lao (jab aae) to (der ke kaphfaara mein) ghodon kee taangon aur gardanon par haath pher (kaat) ne lage
aur hamane sulemaan ka imtehaan liya aur unake takht par ek bejaan dhad laakar gira diya

phir (sulemaan ne meree taraph) roojoo kee (aur) kaha paravaradigaar mujhe bakhsh de aur mujhe vah mulk ata pharama jo mere baad kisee ke vaaste shaayaanh na ho isamen to shak nahin ki too bada bakhshane vaala hai
to hamane hava ko unaka taabee kar diya ki jahaan vah pahunchana chaahate the unake hukm ke mutaabiq dheemee chaal chalatee thee
aur (isee tarah) jitane shayaateen (dev) imaarat banaane vaale aur gota lagaane vaale the
sabako (taabee kar diya aur isake alaava) doosare devon ko bhee jo zanzeeron mein jakade hue the
ai sulemaan ye hamaaree behisaab ata hai pas (use logon ko dekar) ehasaan karo ya (sab) apane hee paas rakho
aur isamen shak nahin ki sulemaan kee hamaaree baaragaah mein kurb va mazelat aur umada jagah hai
aur (ai rasool) hamaare (khaas) bande ayyoob ko yaad karo jab unhonne apane paravaragiaar se phariyaad kee ki mujhako shaitaan ne bahut azeeyat aur takaleeph pahuncha rakhee hai
to hamane kaha ki apane paanv se (zameen ko) thukara do aur chashma nikaala to hamane kaha (ai ayyoob) tumhaare nahaane aur peene ke vaaste ye thanda paanee (haazir) hai
aur hamane unako aur unake ladake vaale aur unake saath utane hee aur apanee khaas meharabaanee se ata kie

aur aklamandon ke lie ibarat va naseehat (qaraar dee) aur hamane kaha ai ayyoob tum apane haath se seenko ka mattha lo (aur usase apanee beevee ko) maaro apanee qasam mein jhoothe na bano hamane kaha ayyoob ko yaqeenan saabir paaya vah kya achchhe bande the

beshak vah hamaaree baaragaah mein bade jhukane vaale the aur (ai rasool) hamaare bandon mein ibraaheem aur isahaaq aur beshak vah (hamaaree baaragaah mein) bade jhukane vaale the aur (ai rasool) hamaare bandon mein ibaraaheem aur isahaaq aur yaakoob ko yaad karo jo kuvat aur baseerat vaale the
hamane un logon ko ek khaas siphat aakherat kee yaad se mumataaz kiya tha
aur isamen shak nahin ki ye log hamaaree baaragaah mein baraguzeeda aur nek logon mein hain
aur (ai rasool) ismaeel aur alayasa aur julakifal ko (bhee) yaad karo aur (ye) sab nek bandon mein hain
ye ek naseehat hai aur isamen shak nahin ki parahezagaaron ke lie (aakherat mein) yaqeenee achchhee aaraamagaah hai
(yaani) hamesha rahane ke (behisht ke) sadaabahaar baagaat jinake daravaaze unake lie (baraabar) khule hogen
aur ye log vahaan takiye lagae hue (chain se baithe) hogen vahaan (khuddaame behisht se) kasarat se meve aur sharaab mangavaenge
aur unake pahaloo mein neechee nazaron vaalee (sharameelee) kamasin beeviyaan hogee
(mominon) ye vah cheez hain jinaka hisaab ke din (qayaamat) ke lie tumase vaayada kiya jaata hai
beshak ye hamaaree (dee huee) rozee hai jo kabhee tamaam na hogee
ye parahezagaaron ka (anjaam) hai aur sarakashon ka to yaqeenee bura thikaana hai
jahannum jisamen unako jaana padega to vah kya bura thikaana hai
ye khaulata hua paanee aur peep aur is tarah anava aqasaam kee doosaree cheeze hain
to ye log unheen pade chakha karen (kuchh logon ke baare mein) badon se kaha jaega
ye (tumhaaree chelon kee) phauj bhee tumhaare saath hee dhoonsee jaegee unaka bhala na ho ye sab bhee dozakh ko jaane vaale hain
to chele kahengen (ham kyon) balki tum (jahannumee ho) tumhaara hee bhala na ho to tum hee logon ne to is (bala) se hamaara saamana kara diya to jahannum bhee kya buree jagah hai
(phir vah) arz karegen paravaradigaar jis shakhs ne hamaara is (bala) se saamana kara diya to too us par hamase badhakar jahannum mein do guna azaab kar
aur (phir) khud bhee kahegen hamen kya ho gaya hai ki ham jin logon ko (duniya mein) shareer shumaar karate the ham unako yahaan (dozakh) mein nahin dekhate
kya ham unase (naahaq) masakharaapan karate the ya unakee taraph se (hamaaree) onkhe palat gayee hain
isamen shak nahin ki jahannumiyon ka baaham jhagadana ye bilkul yaqeenee theek hai
(ai rasool) tum kah do ki main to bas (azaabe khuda se) daraane vaala hoon aur yakata qahaar khuda ke siva koee maabood qaabile parasatish nahin
saare aasamaan aur zameen ka aur jo cheeze un donon ke daramiyaan hain (sabaka) paravaradigaar gaalib bada bakhshane vaala hai
(ai rasool) tum kah do ki ye (qayaamat) ek bahut bada vaaqiya hai
jisase tum log (khvaahamaakhvaah) munh pherate ho
aalam baala ke rahane vaale (pharishte) jab vaaham bahas karate the usakee mujhe bhee khabar na thee
mere paas to bas vahee kee gayee hai ki main (khuda ke azaab se) saaph-saaph daraane vaala hoon
(vah bahas ye thee ki) jab tumhaare paravaradigaar ne pharishton se kaha ki main geelee mittee se ek aadamee banaane vaala hoon
to jab main usako duroost kar loon aur isamen apanee (paida) kee huee rooh phoonk do to tum sab ke sab usake saamane sajade mein gir padana
to sab ke sab kul pharishton ne sajada kiya
magar (ek) ibalees ne ki vah shekhee mein aa gaya aur kaaphiron mein ho gaya

khuda ne (ibalees se) pharamaaya ki ai ibalees jis cheez ko mainne apanee khaas kudarat se paida kiya (bhala) usako sajada karane se tujhe kisee ne roka kya toone taqabbur kiya ya vaakee too bade daraje vaalen mein hai
ibalees bol utha ki main usase behatar hoon toone mujhe aag se paida kiya aur isako toone geelee mittee se paida kiya
(kahaan aag kahaan mittee) khuda ne pharamaaya ki too yahaan se nikal (door ho) too yaqeenee maradood hai
aur tujh par roz jaza (qayaamat) tak meree phitakaar pada karegee
shaitaan ne arz kee paravaradigaar too mujhe us din tak kee mohalat ata kar jisamen sab log (dobaara) utha khade kie jaayenge
pharamaaya tujhe ek vakt muayyan ke din tak kee mohalat dee gayee
vah bola teree hee ijzat va jalaal kee qasam
unamen se tere khaalis bandon ke siva sab ke sab ko zaroor gumaraah karoonga
khuda ne pharamaaya to (ham bhee) haq baat (kahe dete hain)
aur main to haq hee kaha karata hoon
ki main tujhase aur jo log teree taabedaaree karenge un sab se jahannum ko zaroor bharoonga
(ai rasool) tum kah do ki main to tumase na is (tabaleege risaalat) kee mazadooree maangata hoon aur na main (jhooth mooth) banaavat karane vaala hoon
ye (quraan) to bas saare jahaann ke lie naseehat hai
aur kuchh dinon baad tumako isakee haqeekat maaloom ho jaegee
(is) kitaab (quraan) ka naazil karana us khuda kee baaragaah se hai jo (sab par) gaalib hikamat vaala hai
(ai rasool) hamane kitaab (kuraan) ko bilkul theek naazil kiya hai to tum ibaadat ko usee ke lie nira khura karake khuda kee bandagee kiya karo

aagaah raho ki ibaadat to khaas khuda hee ke lie hai aur jin logon ne khuda ke siva (auron ko apana) saraparast bana rakha hai aur kahate hain ki ham to unakee parasatish sirf isalie karate hain ki ye log khuda kee baaragaah mein hamaara taqarrab badha degen isamen shak nahin ki jis baat mein ye log jhagadate hain (qayaamat ke din) khuda unake daramiyaan isamen phaisala kar dega beshak khuda jhoothe naashukre ko manzile maqasood tak nahin pahunchaaya karata
agar khuda kisee ko (apana) beta banaana chaahata to apane makhalooqaat mein se jise chaahata muntakhib kar leta (magar) vah to usase paak va paakeeza hai vah to yakata bada zabaradast allaah hai

usee ne saare aasamaan aur zameen ko baja (duroost) paida kiya vahee raat ko din par oopar tale lapetata hai aur vahee din ko raat par tah ba tah lapetata hai aur usee ne aaphataab aur mahataab ko apane bas mein kar liya hai ki ye sabake sab apane (apane) muqararr vakt chalate rahegen aagaah raho ki vahee gaalib bada bakhshane vaala hai

usee ne tum sabako ek hee shakhs se paida kiya phir us (kee baaqee mittee) se usakee beebee (hauvva) ko paida kiya aur usee ne tumhaare lie aath qism ke chaarapae paida kie vahee tumako tumhaaree maanon ke pet mein ek qism kee paidaish ke baad doosaree qism (nutphe jama hua khoon lothada) kee paidaish se tehare tehare andheron (pet) raham aur jhillee mein paida karata hai vahee allaah tumhaara paravaradigaar hai usee kee baadashaahee hai usake siva maabood nahin to tum log kahaan phire jaate ho

agar tumane usakee naashukree kee to (yaad rakho ki) khuda tumase bilkul beparavaah hai aur apane bandon se kuphr aur naashukree ko pasand nahin karata aur agar tum shukr karoge to vah usako tumhaare vaaste pasand karata hai aur (qayaamat mein) koee kisee (ke gunaah) ka bojh (apanee gardan par) nahin uthaega phir tumako apane paravaradigaar kee taraph lautana hai to (duniya mein) jo kuchh (bhala bura) karate the vah tumhen bata dega vah yaqeenan dilon ke raaz (tak) se khoob vaaqiph hai

aur aadamee (kee haalat to ye hai ki) jab usako koee takaleeph pahunchatee hai to usee kee taraph roojoo karake apane paravaradigaar se dua karata hai (magar) phir jab khuda apanee taraph se use neamat ata farama deta hai to jis kaam ke lie pahale usase dua karata tha use bhula deta hai aur balki khuda ka shareek banaane lagata hai taaki (us zarie se aur logon ko bhee) usakee raah se gumaraah kar de (ai rasool aise shakhs se) kah do ki thode dinon aur apane kuphr (kee haalat) mein chain kar lo

(aakhir) too yaqeenee jahannumiyon mein hoga kya jo shakhs raat ke avaqaat mein sajada karake aur khade-khade (khuda kee) ibaadat karata ho aur aakherat se darata ho apane paravaradigaar kee rahamat ka ummeedavaar ho (naashukre) kaaphir ke baraabar ho sakata hai (ai rasool) tum poochho to ki bhala kaheen jaanane vaale aur na jaananevaale log baraabar ho sakate hain (magar) naseehat ibaraten to bas aklamand hee log maanate hain

(ai rasool) tum kah do ki ai mere eemaanadaar bandon apane paravaradigaar (hee) se darate raho (kyonki) jin logon ne is duniya mein nekee kee unheen ke lie (aakherat mein) bhalaee hai aur khuda kee zameen to kushaada hai (jahaan ibaadat na kar sako use chhod do) sabr karane vaalon hee kee to unaka bharapoor behisaab badala diya jaega
(ai rasool) tum kah do ki mujhe to ye hukm diya gaya hai ki main ibaadat ko usake lie khaas karake khuda hee kee bandagee karo
aur mujhe to ye hukm diya gaya hai ki main sabase pahal musalamaan hoon
(ai rasool) tum kah do ki agar main apane paravaradigaar kee naapharamaanee karoon to main ek badee (sakht) din (qayaamat) ke azaab se darata hoon
(ai rasool) tum kah do ki main apanee ibaadat ko usee ke vaaste khaalis karake khuda hee kee bandagee karata hoon (ab rahe tum) to usake siva jisako chaaho poojo

(ai rasool) tum kah do ki phil haqeeqat ghaate mein vahee log hain jinhonne apana aur apane ladake vaalon ka qayaamat ke din ghaata kiya aagaah raho ki sareehee (khullam khulla) ghaata yahee hai ki unake lie unake oopar se aag hee ke odhane hogen
aur unake neeche bhee (aag hee ke) bichhaune ye vah azaab hai jisase khuda apane bandon ko daraata hai to ai mere bandon mujhee se darate raho
aur jo log buton se unake poojane se bache rahe aur khuda hee kee taraph rooju kee unake lie (jannat kee) khushakhabaree hai

to (ai rasool) tum mere (khaas) bandon ko khushakhabaree de do jo baat ko jee lagaakar sunate hain aur phir usamen se achchhee baat par amal karate hain yahee vah log hain jinakee khuda ne hidaayat kee aur yahee log aklamand hain
to (ai rasool) bhala jis shakhs par azaab ka vaayada poora ho chuka ho to kya tum us shakhs kee khalaasee de sakate ho

jo aag mein (pada) ho magar jo log apane paravaradigaar se darate rahe unake oonche-oonche mahal hain (aur) baala khaanon par baalaakhaane bane hue hain jinake neeche naharen jaaree hain ye khuda ka vaayada hai (aur) vaayada khilaaphee nahin kiya karata

kya tumane is par gaur nahin kiya ki khuda hee ne aasamaan se paanee barasaaya phir usako zameen mein chashmen banaakar jaaree kiya phir usake zarie se rang birang (ke galle) kee khetee ugaata hai phir (pakane ke baad) sookh jaatee hai to tum ko vah zard dikhaayee detee hai phir khuda use choor-choor bhoosa kar deta hai beshak isamen aklamandon ke lie (badee) ibarat va naseehat hai

to kya vah shakhs jis ke seene ko khuda ne (qubool) islaam ke lie kushaada kar diya hai to vah apane paravaradigaar (kee hidaayat) kee raushanee par (chalata) hai magar gumaraahon ke baraabar ho sakata hai aphasos to un logon par hai jinake dil khuda kee yaad se (gaafil hokar) sakht ho gae hain

ye log sareehee gumaraahee mein (pade) hain khuda ne bahut hee achchha kalaam (yaavee ye) kitaab naazil pharamaee (jisakee aayaten) ek doosare se milatee julatee hain aur (ek baat kaee-kaee baar) doharaee gayee hai usake sunane se un logon ke rongate khade ho jaate hain jo apane paravaradigaar se darate hain phir unake jism naram ho jaate hain aur unake dil khuda kee yaad kee taraph ba itamenaan mutaavajje ho jaate hain ye khuda kee hidaayat hai isee se jisakee chaahata hai hidaayat karata hai aur khuda jisako gumaraahee mein chhod de to usako koee raah par laane vaala nahin

to kya jo shakhs qayaamat ke din apane munh ko bade azaab kee sipar banaega (naazee ke baraabar ho sakata hai) aur zaalimon se kaha jaega ki tum (duniya mein) jaisa kuchh karate the ab usake maze chakho
jo log unase pahale guzar gae unhonne bhee (paigambaron ko) jhuthalaaya to un par azaab is tarah aa pahuncha ki unhen khabar bhee na huee
to khuda ne unhen (isee) duniya kee zindagee mein roosavaee kee lajzat chakha dee aur aakherat ka azaab to yaqeenee usase kaheen badhakar hai kaash ye log ye baat jaanate
aur hamane to is quraan mein logon ke (samajhaane ke) vaaste har tarah kee misaal bayaan kar dee hai taaki ye log naseehat haasil karen
(ham ne to saaph aur salees) ek arabee kuraan (naazil kiya) jisamen zara bhee kajee (pecheedagee) nahin

taaki ye log (samajhakar) khuda se dare khuda ne ek misaal bayaan kee hai ki ek shakhs (gulaam) hai jisamen kaee jhagadaaloo saajhee hain aur ek zaalim hai ki poora ek shakhs ka hai un donon kee haalat yakasaan ho sakatee hain (haragiz nahin) alhamadolillaah magar unamen aksar itana bhee nahin jaanate
(ai rasool) beshak tum bhee marane vaale ho
aur ye log bhee yaqeenan marane vaale hain phir tum log qayaamat ke din apane paravaradigaar kee baaragaah mein baaham jhagadoge
